## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Code is self-documenting or adequately commented
- [ ] No debugging code or console logs left in
- [ ] Error handling is appropriate

### Documentation
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] API documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] Changelog updated

### Dependencies
- [ ] No new dependencies added
- [ ] New dependencies are justified and documented
- [ ] requirements.txt updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Dependencies are pinned to specific versions

### Machine Learning (if applicable)
- [ ] Model validation performed
- [ ] Performance metrics documented
- [ ] Data validation checks added
- [ ] Model versioning updated
